body_html:
@angersson, I did add my platform information. In case of mistake I state here again:

SYSTEM INFO:
OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Tensorflow version: 1.4.0
Python version: 2.7.12

My code is a multi GPU session for testing in an open-sourced project tf-faster-rcnn, and here is my multi_gpu_demo.py script.

multi_gpu_demo.zip

body:
@angersson, I did add my platform information. In case of mistake I state here again:

SYSTEM INFO:
OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Tensorflow version: 1.4.0
Python version: 2.7.12

My code is a multi GPU session for testing in an open-sourced project [tf-faster-rcnn](https://github.com/endernewton/tf-faster-rcnn), and here is my `multi_gpu_demo.py` script.

[multi_gpu_demo.zip](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1766511/multi_gpu_demo.zip)
